welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Ogden, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brigham City Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Brigham City Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving primarily Delta Air Lines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
